attributes.action: Consider waiving the Human Rights Act if other people's rights have been violated by a criminal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been reported in the press that a sex offender from Sierra Leone can NOT be deported after being found guilty of 11 indecent assaults on women in the UK because his right to family life will be violated. What about the rights of the 11 women who were assaulted? Surely on any basis, the society of the UK would be better off without this man in the country.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
